column10: Received £75 for participating in research project. Hours: 25 mins. Date of payment: 17 August 2011. Payment donated to charity. (Registered 15 September 2011)

column9: Chromogenex PLC, Units 1-2 Heol Rhosyn, Dafen Ind. Est., Llanelli, Carmarthenshire SA14 8QG. Manufacturer of medical lasers. Chromogenex is billed monthly by Augmentor (see category 2 above). Payments from Chromogenex to Augmentor are made once or twice a year. Augmentor is then billed by Severn Capital (see category 1 above and category 9 below) which then pays Mr Garnier about once a year. Payments of circa £500 + VAT per month made to Augmentor. Hours: approx 8 hrs per month. (Registered 27 May 2010) Consultancy ended May 2011.
